channel.title: Why I cant log in to servers? every time it shows errors
channel.description: Every time I try to log in to any server it shows ''error connecting to server. Must be down." :eek: How can i fix it???? :confused:

item.title: Why I cant log in to servers? every time it shows errors
item.dc:creator: @Click_Here Click Here
item.description:
@Click_Here wrote:

you either need hamachi, which can be downloaded at www.hamachi.cc, the port number might be different, check that the ip address is correct, the server might have max players or is down.
